item.description:
Montreal is a great city and the annual Jazz Festival is a world-class event!  I have wanted to go for years...and this year I am determined to do so - and hopefully with some of you Culture Vultures as company!

Here's the specifics - please read carefully!

We leave from Boston South Station via Greyhound Coach at 7:15 am on Saturday, June 25.  Arrive in Montreal at 2:30pm.

Check into the "Auberge L'Apero" - rated the BEST Montreal speciality lodging on Trip Advisor.  http://www.aubergeapero.com/

I have booked two 2-person private rooms with shared bath.   This is not a luxury hotel, but a very nice hostel in a terrific location!  Relax, regroup, refresh before dinner and night out.  I have a couple of places in mind...and there are FIREWORKS on Saturday night!

Sunday and Monday - all Jazz, all the time!  There are free concerts throughout the day and evening and also lots of ticketed events.  Check out the website for the 2011 Festival here: http://www.montrealjazzfest.com

If you get tired of jazz, Montreal is full of other things to do - incredible restaurants, museums, theater, history and just walking around the city!

Tuesday - Leisurely breakfast and perhaps a walking tour - or more jazz!  We leave at 3:45pm and arrive back in Boston at 10:55.

PRICE for round trip bus AND 3 nights accomodation is $275 per person.  To reserve your spot, please send a $125 downpayment to me via Paypal when you RSVP.  The remaining $150 will be due about a month before the trip.

IMPORTANT! To pay me via Paypal: Log into your Paypal account.  Go to "send money."  In the field for email, put: julie.chilton@yahoo.com.  Click "services" for type of purchase.

REFUNDS only by finding someone to take your place!

I am very excited about this trip and I hope three of you will join me!
item.why: It's a fantastic city and the Jazz Festival has some awesome music. And yes, we can do this on a budget!
item.name: Montreal Jazz Festival!!!
